title: IN THANKSGIVING AND LOVE
author: Jude Nnam
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (contemporary Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: In thanksgiving and love, we gather today,
Lifting hands to the Lord, we worship and pray;
For Your mercy endures, Your grace never ends,
We rejoice in Your love that forever defends.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: In thanksgiving and love, we give You our all,
Every offering, every prayer, at Your feet we fall;
You are worthy, O Lord, of glory and praise,
Hallelujah! We sing through all of our days.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: In thanksgiving and love, we walk in Your light,
Guided by truth, clothed in righteousness bright;
By Your Spirit, renew our hearts day by day,
Till we join the great chorus where saints ever stay.
